data.title: Cronin, Catherine Marie

data.text:
Cronin, Catherine Marie, fortified with the Sacraments of Holy Mother Church, Thursday, April 11, 2024, born to Alfred and Katie Steinfeld on January 24, 1931, baptized on February 22, 1931 at Sts. Peter and Paul Church, and united with the love of her life, Robert Corley Cronin, on October 5, 1957 at St. Cecilia Church for 37 years of marriage. Dear mother of Msgr. Timothy Cronin, Paula (Mark) Tapia, Julie Cronin, Jane (Dave) Diehl, Eileen Cronin, and Robert Cronin. Proud grandmother of Sarah Diehl, David (Lauren) Diehl, Melissa Tapia, Mark Tapia, Jr., Liam Cronin, Carolyn Cronin, and Lauren Cronin. Loving great-grandmother of Patrick Robert Diehl. Dear sister of the late John Steinfeld, dear sister-in-law of the late Jack and Bobby Cronin, Babs (the late Joseph) Zickel, Sheran (the late Joseph) Cronin, and Dick and Sally Dean. Beloved relative and friend of Pat and Stella Corley, Ron and Sue Kippenberger, Wendy Worsham, Liz Cronin, and her many nephews and nieces, especially Sally Doheny with her visits. Longtime parishioner of St. Matthias the Apostle. A woman of steadfast faith in God and the Church with a loving heart to her family and friends.

Services: Funeral from Kutis South County Chapel (5255 Lemay Ferry) on Monday, April 22 for 11:00 am Mass of Christian Burial at St. Margaret Mary Alacoque Church (4900 Ringer Rd.) Interment Jefferson Barracks National Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations to Carmelite Monastery or Kenrick-Glennon Seminary appreciated. Visitation at Kutis, Sunday, April 21, from 4-8 pm.
